errors.error_description: Mixes Python import code with shell pip command in the same code block, creating confusion
correction_candidates: Separate into two blocks: installation commands first, then Python usage examples
Remove pip command from Python code block and show only import examples
Move pip install to a separate Installation section above the Quick Start
Replace with proper code block structure using different language tags
errors.golden_answer: Separate into two blocks: installation commands first, then Python usage examples
